reviews.name: Jredj
reviews.subject: Great for during/after workout
reviews.comment: Love the way these fit. Helps ease shoulders after workout. Bonus keeps you sitting straight.

reviews.name: UA Strm Armour down parka
reviews.subject: Product is gret
reviews.comment: Feels great and comfortable for lifting! It's not a shirt to wear if you're shy. The neck opening doesn't stretch a lot so you might want to go up a size and it should still be plenty tight. I went up to a large from a medium.
